content.detailedDescription: These are the two letters i just wrote to the kecksburg pa. petition site. itawoke something in me again. i have to find out what is stored, if anything, inmy mind.91lkean@ix.Netcom.Com92 and paufo@westol.Com were the two e-mails that were sent 10-14-2003. they areas followsplease help me with the suspected trajectory. if the path is where i suspect,then i can offer a very interesting account. there were six of us kids campingin a tent in our backyard. then it slowly became high noon. it was approaching1130 pm. i was sent from the tent to get a power cable to watch a localcleveland tv program. as i unzipped the tent, i saw the back of the house getbrighter and brighter. i stepped out and looked behind us. what happened nexthas changed my life. ever since then, i have asked only my brother about it. heseems to shrug it off. he was with the remaining four that only saw it pass thehouse tops and chased it to the front yard only to see what appeared to be ameteor. i was the first and stared right into it. my cousin kenny followed meand just caught it before it passed over the house. anyway, if the eventcoincides with the trajectory, time of year and time of night, then maybe i holdsomething for you. i am an artist. ever since then, i have excelled. my visualmemory of how it looked has not faded. it is almost as if something is waiting.I have really never told anyone, except an occasional girlfriend or buddy. but ifeel that there is a very strange point to this that might surprise anyone whowill not ridicule me. i am a professional designer and account representativeand would not want to put my job in jeopardy. i will secretly go under. there ismore. afterwards, at night, lights would appear in the field behind the house. ithought that they were flash lights looking for something until they penetratedthe bedroom wall and that is where i wake up every time. i was around five orsix. maybe i can helpthen again maybe you can help me get rid of this haunting memory that hassecretly consumed me for well over 37 years.I just looked at the sight after i wrote my first letter to you and saw thedate. it was dated december if my event took place in our backyard in a tent, itwas warm and maybe later. the lights that kept coming back were what please helpme find out. the object i witnessed was heading due east. the address that ispoke of when it was seen was 3522 clarks mill road, norton, ohio 44203. i donot live there now. some of my relatives still

it was around 10.30 pm to 11 pm i was sleeping on my top bunk of my bed i was stiring out the window win a red light apeared out of nowere and movie across the ski i felt so calm win i looked at it i ran up stirs telling my mom about what i seen she look out the window and she didt see anything i down stirs agin i wint to my brothers old room my dogs in the backyard look confusid stiring at the ski im not sure what i seen but im a major beliver in ufos even befour the strange light i seen  welll i u no what i seen that night please contated me at 364-4479 of st,johns newfoundland

At approximately 1733 hours as the sun was dissipating into the horizon theabove stated people and i all military personell reported seeing a u.F.O.. itwas quite ominous. however, u.F.O.S in the hill country area of texas isntunknown.
content.summary: U.F.O. sightings in kendall county, texas

content.detailedDescription: On october 5, 2003, i was sitting in my wheelchair in my living room by thefront door of my home.  i noticed lights moving in the west of my position in anabnormal manner in the distance  i got my sony digital camera with the 10x zoom, pointed it in the direction of the lights and began shooting.  since then,thelights have been out there every night  the bugs bite so bad that i could onlyget outside on two of those nights, but i took about four hundred pictures. unfortunately, i shoot many of them through the screen.Did not matter much, only the closest images were greatly effected. the smallerimages, presumably further away provide the best detail.There seems to be 3 or 4 classes of vehicles. a large dark craft in the fardistance - resembles back view of traditional v craft, and two similar butdistinctly seprate multi-decked sphere shape craft.I do not know what the glowing disk are but they are always seen together withthe other three three craft.I will be out there tonight with my camera.
content.summary: Moving lights on horizon are structured craft  3 o

content.detailedDescription: Physio_after_eventeyesightphysio_after_eventsleep_disorderyour questionnaire was hard to be accurate.  my experience is as none i haveever heard about.Physio_after_eventotherentity_typehuman-likearound sept. 15th, 2002 my husband and i see a fast darting object while we werespaing.  it had held still looking like a star for awhile before it left. it hadno effect on us except excitement.  we seperated 3 months later6 weeks after i visited husband at house for 2nd encounter much closerentity_typehumanoidnext night close encounter with witnessesentity_typeape-like5 ufos starlikeentity_typeapparitionprotective of me. the next 7 to 10 days visited in my apartment by hologramsentity_typeother5 human looking menheightunder_3_feetcaptains of starlike ufosheight3_feetlove, trust, attraction, sex ,yes with a hologram a deep meaning for theirarrival to me, etc. were established.  after the 7 to 10 days i walked into myapartment and the holograms had changed and for the next 5 to 5 and a halfmonths i was tortured every night.  they changed appearances often and storieswhy they were there and promise not to hurt me anymore.  i always believed themhopeful3height4_feetheight5_feetapparelloose-fittingapparel_colorwhiteapparel_colorgreenapparel_colorclear_transparentapparel_featuresrobe_or_cape
content.summary: Dailey abuse from extraterrestials or terrible hoa

content.detailedDescription: 1  i was in my car ... driving ... just off hwy 5 south-bound exit 19 toashland, oregon2  at the red light ... intersection of highway 99 and valley view rd.  saw 2people male  female 40-somethings between buildings of mr. cs and next doormexican restaurant looking up in the sky in that close encounters of the thirdkind wonderment and awe.  the light turned green, i began very slow left turn --because i wanted to see what the people mentioned above were in awe about ... itwas then at mid-turning i saw this large, blackish brown triangular craft aboveexit 19 with the texaco station in foreground for scale close to exit 19.3  i thought -- hmmm.  that is not a regular aircraft.  oh, my -- that is a ufo...4  i had slowed to a near stop in the middle of the left turn -- a car came upbehind me from the same direction, i had to complete the turn, i countiuedlooking at it and turning to the front to navigate to the immediate side of theroad.  i was calm -- i had a sense of wonderment as to what i had seen.  when ilooked back -- it was gone.5  object was a large, blackish brown triangular craft -- no bigger that 100feet in diameter.  it hovered.  i have a recreation i made in bryce and map ofscene back in october of 2000 if required.6  i had pulled over to the immediate curb when the car behind me came up.  bythe time i looked to the sky and the location it was seen -- it was gone.

Close to 930 or so i stepped outside to smoke and turned to see a peculiar lightin the north sky. the stars weret completely visible at that point. for severalseconds i watched a bright light descend slowly and then stop at a point asubstantial several degrees lower from where i first spotted it. while i staredat it, i thought for a moment to run inside and get somebody. in that instantthe light, as best i could tell, either turned off or sped away in the oppositedirection very fast. i lived in the clear-sky hill country for years. i knowwhat a shooting star looks like and this certainly wasnt one. it wasnt asatellite or a plane. i truly dont know what it was.

Bright star-like object observed hovering in sky approx. 230 a.M. 101103, withlight pulsating randomly white with red and blue. witness one observed objectwhile calling out the door for errant cat. he thought at first it was anairplane, but it didnt move for over an hour as witness one intermittentlycalled for cat. witness one woke witness two at approximately 330 a.M. toobserve. through binoculars, both witnesses observed bright white light brighterthan normal star with pulsating red and blue lights. movement was then notedrelative to pine tree in yard. object moved smoothly up and down, and left andright, as it seemed to move away from witnesses. witness one reports object wasgone when he checked about 400 a.M. witness two checked again at approximately500 a.M. when calling for missing cat, and thought she observed the light muchfarther away it was less bright but still pulsating on the same horizontal planebut much farther to the northeast. missing cat came home safe that morning.
All i know is what i remember is what i wrote and a t-rex that punched and bitme.

I went to the store to get a perscription for my daughter. i got out of the carin the stores parking lot and had a strange feeling to look to the westward sky.Sure enough there was a glowing object that was pulsing difrint colors butmainly was white like a star. after returning home i went to the back yard tosee if it was there and it was. so i called the other adults outside to see ifthey thought it was strange and they did so i got my hi-8 video camera out andtaped it until it went behind the building behind my house.

On sept. 30th 2003 myself and 3 of my 4 children walked outside like we do everyschool morning at 700 am to wait on the school bus that picks up the kids infront of the house. when we walked outside,standing on the front porch i lookedup at the sky like i always do...And there it was. i had no idea what it was. itwas kinda shaped like an arrowhead it was a solid color, but changed colors whenthe sunlight hit it. colors where redish-orange to red and would also turn agolden color.It was headed ne. and seemed to stay on that coarse. we watched itfor about 6 minutes then it just vanished. i told my husband about it later andhe called the police dept. and asked if anyone else had called in about it andthey said no.
content.summary: Almost arrowhead shape  orangeish red color

content.detailedDescription: One night of threetaken outside for a walk in a small little neighborhood of ingelside texasi was overtaken by the u. s. star wars haarp prograam approx. 12 to 15satellites came down from the night sky to open eyes to this encredibletechnology. zero energy and antigravity, arranging into a set of four, the setbounced in unisom from apex to leftdown, back to apex, then rightdown, togetherin four in unisom  the others encircled me and began to play

I was walking home from albertsons college when a tall, skinny, grey alien wasreleasing feces in the bushes. it saw me and started chasing me.  me and myfreind ran to the closest building which happend to be pizza hut.  no onebelieved us then the alien came in and killed everyone buy picking tham up andsmacking there heads against the floor. one man escaped besides us but we dontknow who he was.
content.summary: A unidentified creature followed me home from scho

content.detailedDescription: 1. i was at home. i live about 4mi. southeast from luke air force base. i was inmy back yard with my kids. 2. i am always sky watching. i saw one red glowingball of light south of the base. 3. i thought it was a ufo. i have seen thistype before around the base, around same time on night. i have seen then duringthe day also. i see things everyday but, do not report them. 4. i was excited. igot in a better position to watch. 5. first, one ball of light lit up verybright south of base. about 10 min. later, as f-16s were flying over the basenorthward appeared to be on normal flight, to the northeast of the planes, oneby one 5 different balls of light lit up in a huge triangle formation lastingabout 10 sec. i called my husband out, they disappeared. as i was explaning whathappened, one by one 5 balls of light lit up south of 1st formation in a halfcircle over base. jets were still flying below these lights  didnt seem tonotice. the lights lit up very bright for about 5 sec. 3 of our children alsosaw the lights but, they were not very interested. i never saw the lights leave.They were stationary  appeared out of the darkness. first as a small star-likelight then glowing magnified to about aspirin size from my viewpoint. 6. thelights faded  i cont. to watch for 45min. but, never saw anymore. from the 1stsighting at 730pm, the 1st formation was about 743pm then the 2nd formationabout  746pm.
content.summary: Witnessed red glowing balls of light

content.detailedDescription: There has been object observed first from my front door, approx 3weeks ago, andi took still 35mm pictures, in fact,the roll is still in my camera, i dont knowif they will turn out or not,i took maybe 5.This object is like an arrow but thehorizontal line is only as long as the slanted lines, and looking at it withbinoculars i can see red ,bluishviolet lights as if these lights were some sortof exhaust.And this thing moves a lot,james thinks it maybe a satellite, but iam not convinced.Tonight i saw this object about 6 or 7 inches below the end ofthe small dipper and maybe 5 inches to the left.I am sorry i do not knowlongitude or latitude, butiknow if you came out to see it,you will.I appreciateyour time and hope to speak to someone from your organization.Also what do youthink of implantsi have whatappears to be a metal but flexible fragmentin myinner arm thathas been there for 10 year sor more,i have tried to pick itout,butam unable to get to it.And i have had no injury ever to that site.

On june 7th, 1982 at around 923 p.M saturday night, i was taking girlfriend home near hulman airport. the house is on the east side of terre haute, indiana and the airport is on the far east side of terre haute. i got out of my car and started looking at the stars becasue i am very interested in space and ufology. i thought to my self that it would be interesting if i saw a ufo. to my surprise i noticed a bright whirling object coming slowly from the east it was moving in a westerly direction. my girlfriend walked next to me and asked what is that i said i think it's a ufo then the object stopped and hovered directly in front of us at tree top level. the object was about 30 to 50 feet away from us. for some strange reason we felt like the object was studying us as well as we were studying it. the object hovered for about 45 seconds and them started moving slowly to the west. then all of a sudden it shot out of sight in about 2 seconds. the object was white in color, but it was whirling and made no noise at all unlike a heliocopter. i have been around planes all my life, but i have never observed a craft like this. when we saw the craft, my girlfriend and i both had goose bumps on our arms and had a feeling of helplessness, but elation that we had seen this object. i have always wanted to see a ufo and i got my chance. i must say that it has changed my life in some ways. i have alwaysbelieved that there wer other beings in the universe, but this confirmed my belief. i must say that i believe sightings may run in families. my father was flying his beechcraft bonanza near hulman airport the same airport that i was in close proximity to when i sighted  my ufo, about 40 years ago and he came home stating the a bright object almost collided with his plane. he reported it to the tower, but i do not know what happened after that i did not report my sighting becuase i was afraid there would be repercussions if i reported it to the authorities. if i had to do it over again i would have reported it. my fathers brother was a farmer in hume, il and he was driving his tractor out in his field in the same year i encountered my ufo, in 1982, which i feel is strange. he told me tha

I was driving home from cleveland, going e on i-480, listening to wnir  talkradio out of akron, traveling perhaps 70 mph. at approx exit 35, i noticed abright white light that reminded me of an airplane landing light coming at me.Being not too far from cleve-hopkins airport, that was my first thought. itseemed to hover in place then, faster than any airplane i have ever seen, theobject headed towards the se at a very rapid clip- like watching a shootingstar. the object started out somewhat n in direction, and went se. the almostfull moon was just to the right of the object, it went under the moon during itstravel. the sun was over the right side rear of my car. i lost sight of theobject behind trees in the distance. i was kinda tense after work, and viewingthis object made me forget about the bad day i had today-i am an auto mechanicin cleveland. nothing noted with my car- i drive a gas-electric honda insight. inoted time, approx place and conditions- i am also a bigfoot researcher andparanormal investigator. i have never seen any object move so fast, other than ashooting star at night, but this was still daylight- not a cloud in the sky.If possible, could i be kept informed of any findings due to this matter, suchas radar reports of air traffic in the area, or other witnesses to this eventthank you for providing an outlet.Jeff weingart

Due to disability i frequently wake up early am so am frequently awake in theearly am. this morning was no different and i went outside to feed our outdoorkitty on the deck wrap around deck. we live in a two story home at elevation 2500 ft. i can clearly see sacramento city lights from our deck on a clearnight, and last night was clear. i looked up and saw a red light in the sky atan elevation that a small aircraft would fly, going over our house headed forsacramento. i heard no sounds but figured it was a commuter light plane on itsway from gv airport. i fed the cat and looked up and saw the red light againabout a minute later hovering down in the sacramento area, just a bright redround light. it was there too long to be an aircraft, and had no other lightsassociated with it.  for about two minutes i watched this red light hovering inthe same spot when suddenly it moved upwards and was stationary again, howeverits light was pulsating, and continued to pulsate in this spot for about 60 moreseconds then flew off with great speed to my left and hovered there for a fewseconds pulsating again. the light then sped away and vanished in a s or edirection. we have a tree-line in that direction and further view was obscured.We would be interested to know if anyone else reported any similar sightingsaround the same time of early morning.
content.summary: Red ufo sighting over sacramento valley, 100603 @

content.detailedDescription: Camping at top of a small mountain. at 3 am, looking up we realized somethingwas moving like a top on a table surface. soon afterward we noticed another,this one much closer as we could see the colors of the exterior lights. weattempted to photograph the objects, and notices several more. upon laying onthe ground and looking up at the sky, about 12-15 of these objects were visibleat varying altitudes. we saw evidence of synchronized movement between the first2 that we saw. we stayed and watched for 2 12 hours. most of the objectsresembled stars at first examination, but all were moving in the spinning topside to side and sometimes up and down motion, perhaps 2 degrees each direction.We both watch the sky regularly, and more so when we are in the mountains. aclear sky last night allowed a tremendous view of the night sky. neither of ushas ever seen stellar motion  or any other object of that nature.  we want toknow if any other sightings were reported on this event. is there a place wecould check

Here is a photo i took on the 30th of this month,just west of our house, what i believe to be a ufo, it hovered for a short bit,and then took off at very high velocity and was gone in a matter of a few secssee what you think

I was working my regular job as a locomotive engineer. i pulled in behindanother train at a union pacific railroad siding called hestes, which is locatedbetween hutto and taylor, texas. i was waiting for a train to pass in theopposite direction. i walked out the back door of the locomotive and stood onthe walkway, this location has little light pollution and i was star gazing. atabout 115 a.M i noticed what i first thought was an aircraft, coming overheadfrom the northeast. it soon became clear that this was nothing i had seenbefore. what i witnessed was an elongated object that looked rather like adomino, with the edges rounded off. it had rows of white lights on what appearedto be the bottom of the object. the object itself was black and there was aslight ripple effect as it moved below the stars. the white lights on the objectglowed steadily. there were no colored lights and no lights flashed on and off.I do not know if the object emitted any sound due to the noise from thelocomtive which was idleing. it would be very hard for me to judge its speed butit had to be moving very fast as it only took 10 to 12 seconds for it to movecompletely out of sight. i have been a member of mufon for a while now, however,i have never reported a sighting before. we always imagine what a sighting mightbe like, but i never expected it to look like this.
content.summary: Saw an elongated object with multiple white lights

content.detailedDescription: Driving in auto on country road near dunreith . its brightness at 45 degrees in sw sky. didnt' know what it could be. reaction amazement nearly freaked out is word witness used. stopped car and watched it for about 4 or 5 minutes. at home same object reappeared same place in sky .Watched for 2 minutes. object never moved but rather this yellow-white mix silver delta shaped object just vanished at times. lost sight when it vanished and never returned. the newcastle post officer arrive late at the 1st. sighting and said he hd never seen anything like it. the newcastle post told the excited witneses to call me donald worey connersville donhelp1@webtv.Net. i had many many ufo sightings in 66 67 and 73 waves and other years but stopped gettng things in the sky and investigated and reserched abduction and the nordic type aliens. i have been at this for 38 years and have helped over 200 abductees and have written over 50 articles on our avocation. i am now age 82 and still do it at a slower pace. though i have helped many i lost one man when he hung himself leaving a wife and three kids. it really upset me to say the least. i have had some injuries to abductees with the worst being the florida  lady who had the rat aliens cleanly remove all their inside female organs. it took me some time to get her out of the depth of dispair. if you want to read some of my articles my web site is httpwww.Abduct.Comworleyworley.Htm. i formerly belonged to nicap. apro, cufos, and mufon . now i'm just freelance.

The following incident occurred about ten years ago. strangely it was  notimportant to me until the past few years. it is really bothering me now.This with my fathers strange untimely death, his connections with themasons,rumored ties to a secret navywhich does not exsistand his documented nowdisappeared squadron ufo chase is now just frightening me.I have scoured the internet for an incident similar to mine and have come upempty handed. of the hundreds of alleged reports i have scoured the only similardetail i have run across two large football field size triangle incidents.Though the happenings, light configuration etc. do not match what i saw.I am scientific minded and believe in ufos  and aliens 100 per centor at leastthe possibility. however, i do strongly feel that most like minded aredelusional, easily led, lying or just plain crazy. i have only told a few peoplemy experience as i do not want others to categorize me as such. maybe i wascrazy at the time. i do not really know where to turn with such a story or howto research my incident. its just plain driving me nuts.In the fallit was just starting to get cool here of 93 or 94sorry not suremygirlfriend and i were watching our local pbs station and we caught the star guysshow. he advised that the most spectacular meteor shower in decades would bevisible in our area away from city lights in a few days.Later we packed a picnic, binoculars and a blanket and headed off for the crossroads at ponte vedra beach. the cross roads is a portion of beach so named afterthe sole condo complex near by. ponte vedra beach is an affluent wealthy area ofour shore line. at the time of the sighting the cross roads was situated in awooded isolated area of the beach. traditionally this area was our high schoolsdomain of the beachthough located over 30 miles from it and we were both in our2nd year of college. you would park in a small, unmarked wooded public beachaccess area as the affluent were dying to kill the public beach access. fromthere a long, narrow sand trail would
content.summary: Football field size triangle jacksonville fforida

content.detailedDescription: Out on the balcony of sara wades 9th floor flat in one of fort collinss only 4high-rise buildings. it was dark and weather conditions were largely clear, withlight cloud to the south that became thicker, but clear up to the cloud. it mayhave been slightly hazy. sara wade noticed an object that looked really closebut didnt make any noise. aaron reid went to look and said its a triangle.Oliver niesewand then came to the front of the balcony and saw it too. it wasvery obvious - clearly triangular shape with five lights that picked out atriangular chevron pointed towards the direction of travel, and a sixth light inthe middle of the configuration. all lights were steady and didnt blink orflash.  the object was moving very fast - faster than a helicopter or passengerjet but looked big - larger than a low altitude helicopter or small jet. twostriking things about it aside from the completely unfamiliar lightconfiguration when compared to civil or military aviation lights was the speedat which it travelled without producing any audible sound - comparable to a lowfighter jet perhaps. however, the apparent size of the object when consideredwith its speed makes this unlikely. it then travelled into the cloud base which,while thin, was enough to conceal it. the whole time of the sighting was about 8seconds. the craft did not seem to change direction at all.Although gauging distancesize in the night sky is very hard to do, it leaves twohard questions that cannot apparently be explained by known craft. the speed ofits travel was so fast and so noiseless that it defies standard explanation whenconsidered with the apparent size of the craft. it was one of the biggest thingswe have ever seen in the night sky.I am surprised that anyone would be flying such a craft in largely clearconditions so low over a town. hardly very secretive, although likely to settongues wagging.I would be interested to know what local air traffic control has logged, or ifanyone else saw it too.
content.summary: Flying triangle over fort collins, co

content.detailedDescription: We were collecting wood for our campfire next to the hired mans trailer when wenoticed a very bright orange light moving from the zenith toward the easternhorizon.  it made no sound and did not deviate from its course.  we kept trackof the object until it became obscured on the eastern horizon, when we noticedanother, identical orange ufo on the same path and at the same speed as thefirst.  it too eventually vanished on the eastern horizon after being observedfor approximately one minute.  the witnesses, besides myself, were my brothercarl 10, my brother-in-laws half-brother perry henderson, and the hired manskids julie rich 16, virgil 14, lynn 11, mike about 10, and one other boy 7.  theexact date of the sighting is unknown, but i reported the event to the enosburgfalls, vermont police department the next day.  i turned 13 on august 11, 1974. during the entire sighting we all perceived the objects as ufos or spaceshipsfrom another planet.  the same evening, we saw many shooting stars, which iexplained to the other youths as not really stars at all.  my brother, carl,would wish present anonymity since he is now 2003 a professional airline pilot.
content.summary: Two orange nocturnal lights in single file, not in

content.detailedDescription: I was just taking random pictures of the sky in the area and found the object inthe picture when i was viewing them on the computer. the camera is a pentaxoptio 230 2.3 megapixel. this picture is all i have of the object. the picturesbefore and after do not have the object. so it was there only momentarily. thiswas sept 13, 2003 at 1415 to approx 1420 and may have been just zipping by as itook the picture but i never actually saw the object.The same such occurence happened on another day sept 16, 2003 at approx 1230 andi feel that is the best picture ive ever gotten when it is blown up. i have tosubmit the photos so you can look at them to better determine just what theobjects may be. the photo taken on the 13th of sept at first glance just lookslike a bird but when the photo was blown up 3 or 4 clicks it becamequestionable.Because the object is at a level where at the angle i was shooting from put itin the center of a long white cloud behind it , it is very hard to get adefining line for the top surface but under the object, the dark part, ishanging down like jelly fish tendrills. the top surface is shiney, reflectinglight, defining line for the surface seems to be flooded out.The photo from sept 16 is different in that there were no clouds in the sky. thesun was almost directly overhead behind me slightly to the left or western sky.I was taking random pictures into the northeastern sky which appeared a verydark blue azure so the objects lines of definition can be made out when blown upeven just slightly. i printed a normal size picture and looked at it with amagnifying glass and was able to clearly see that this is not anything i canidentify. there appears to be a clear or light bluish trail or emmision on theleft side of the object. i need someone with better equipment and knowledge ofvarious sightings to take a look to verify if this is something that others havegotten pictures of aand anything you can tell me because i am very curious aboutthese things.

On 092603 at approximately 0144 hours two colleagues and i observed whatappeared to be a triangle shaped craft moving at a high rate of speed from eastto west. the craft passed almost directly overhead and then made what i woulddescribe as an almost 90 degree turn to the north, and continued on until out ofsite.The estimated duration from when i first saw the light to when the craftdisappeared from view as it headed north was approximately 5-7 seconds.The craft appeared to be dark gray in color, and had what appeared to be asingle amber colored beacon light underneath. during the sighting there wasabsolutely no sound heard by me or the other two witnesses. i wasnt able todetermine the crafts shape until it passed almost directly overhead. as far assize comparison, the rough estimate of the craft as viewed from the ground couldbe compared to a quarter held at arms length against the night sky.My immediate impression regarding the craft was that it seemed to flyeffortlessly through the sky, like an arrow.

In schererville, in. outside of our home walking our dogs, i saw an airplane in the sky, and then saw the three disks shaped lights.  was not sure if it was from the airplane but they stayed the same long after the plane was gone, and were present before. we were curious of them, the three moved back and forth, we had to go in the house, they were still in the sky.

What we witnessed that august 16, 2003 afternoon is described in a report isubmitted to the national ufo reporting center from houston, texas. the websitefor the center is www.Nuforc.Org. you can locate my report by the event date ormy city houston.Here is a summary of what we saw that day. while in my backyard in southeasthouston, texas near the small town of pasadena, with my wife, son and his guest,we witnessed three dark objects for a sustained amount of time. at about 510p.M. on saturday, august 16, my sons 10-year old friend got our attention to anobject she had spotted. the object was dark and was stationary in the sky. atfirst, i thought it to be a cluster of balloons set adrift, but noticed that theobject was not moving. it had no wings or protusions and it appeared that thesun was able to reflect off of it.This lasted for some minutes until the object slowly drifted northwest acrossthe sky. i was still unable to figure out what it was.Once again, my sons friend pointed out two other similar objects stationedfurther out on the horizon. at this point, all three objects were distanced fromeach other by miles of skyline. one of the objects out on the horizon driftedslowly towards our direction, but still not close to the first one.My attention eventually turned back to our backyard activities and by 600 p.M.,the objects were nowhere to be seen.In viewing the national ufo reporting center website, i noticed that two reportsfiled by other witnesses describe similar objects that we saw. a report on 81603from chandler, ar describes similar activities we were doing and reports thattheir objects were seen at almost the exact same time we saw ours another reportgiving an event date as 92003 describes exactly the same objects we saw.Perhaps someone can give us an explanation as to what we saw that day.
content.summary: Three mysterious, dark objects in afternoon sky
